response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $1,200,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unmatched benefits, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,080,000. This offer represents a significant savings of $120,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. We believe this investment will not only provide immediate value but also long-term benefits that align with your strategic objectives. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of our dedicated support throughout the process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1080000}
